channel.title: Help with loggin on my server
channel.description: i can logon my server when i dont put me with Rights at all.. but i logged in once created my player then put rights on him (owner) then after that it started sayin ur acc is already logged in / Invalid user name and pw - it wont elt me logon and other ppl can logon and i can make new accs.. but it wont let me logon my acc any1 help:?

item.title: Help with loggin on my server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

3 is owner-Deleting ur Character and logging back in should work.If not post what error u get when u do that.

Shadow.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with loggin on my server

item.description:
@Satan_Dragon wrote:

iv tried this… and i dont have hamachi at all - I type the ip to my server as the ip totalscape.no-ip.info[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 11:50:37 AM[/size][hr]what about 4 for owner?

item.title: Help with loggin on my server
item.dc:creator: @Ninja Ninja
item.description:
@Ninja wrote:

Go to the charecters folder, and delete your character. Then log into the name you want. Go to characters, click on his .txt and change where it says ‘playerRights = 0’
to ‘playerRights = 3’

Read full topic

item.title: Help with loggin on my server
item.dc:creator: @Satan_Dragon Satan Dragon
item.description:
@Satan_Dragon wrote:

i dont think its that idunno though… i never logged on at all but yea i guess that would work…
it could also be because i never compile it wont let me i just run server after editing this stuff… Because my compile dont work… it says system cannot find path specified when i compile[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 01:57:04 AM[/size][hr]some1 plz reply and help me… I fixed compile it works now but i still cant logon its weird.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 02:06:35 AM[/size][hr]I dont understand this… anyone know whatsup

item.title: Help with loggin on my server
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

Set a timeout for logging out…so if you dont move, etc. you get logged out in “#” seconds.
I dont know the code…but i could look in my codes and get it for you…give me a second
